name: AnymeX
subtitle: Your new favourite tracking and management tool
description:
This is the official source for AnymeX.

For full details, check the GitHub repository:
https://github.com/RyanYuuki/AnymeX

apps.name: AnymeX
apps.subtitle: Multiservice tracking client
apps.localizedDescription: AnymeX is a multiservice tracking client, with AniList, MyAnimeList & Simkl support!

versions.localizedDescription:
🆕 Changelog

• [֍](https://github.com/RyanYuuki/AnymeX/commit/93769c1)  fixed minor issue in progress slider on offline player

• [֍](https://github.com/RyanYuuki/AnymeX/commit/8bc6dd7)  fixed mistaking manhwa as anime


🎨 Style Changes

🆕 Changelog

✨ Features
• **New Profile (Anime 4K)**  
  Introduced a new profile layout optimized for Anime 4K display.

🎨 UI Enhancements
• **New Dropdown Menu**  
  Added a smooth and visually appealing dropdown in:
  • Anime Details Page  
  • Manga Details Page  

🛠 Fixes
• **Reader UI Issues**  
  Resolved layout and display problems in the reader UI.

**New Update is Here!**

• Added new Video Presets feature: choose from Vivid, Anime, Cinema, or create your own Custom filter for a personalized viewing experience.
• Improved Search Filter UI for better clarity and usability.
• Updated Scroll•Aware Header with a refined version by @tanakrit•d 
• Increased max subtitle size limit by @HiroDane
• Significantly improved player performance and responsiveness.
• Fixed issue where playback speed would not apply correctly.
• Resolved bug showing adult indicators on all media items.
